ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: BASTAR SAMAJIK JAN VIKAS SAMITI is a voluntary organization registered under Chhattisgarh Society Registration Act, 1973, on 30th May 2003 in the State of Chhattisgarh. The Executive Committee members as well educated citizens of India and are directly or indirectly involved with the development works of our society. This organization has been constantly been making efforts since its inception for the overall development of the people belonging to the weaker section of our society living in rural,urban,slums in different parts of Bastar and Dantewada district of Chhattisgarh State. BASTAR SAMAJIK JAN VIKAS SAMITI has conducted several programs with the help of donations received from various members and other donors. The following programs were organized. This year the Organization emphasized on implementing programs in the direction of generating awareness on various social issues among the rural people and also organizing programs in cultivating interest towards art and culture among children and young people. 1 ANIMAL WELFARE PROGRAMS 2 PROMOTION OF SHGâ€™S 3 ENVIRONMENT AWARENESS PROGRAMS 4 COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS FOR WOMEN EMPOWERMENT 5 VOCATIONAL TRAINING PROGRAMS 6 ADULT LITERACY PROGRAMS 7 AGRICULTURE & HORTICULTURE DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS 8 SPORTS & CULTURAL PROMOTION ACTIVITIES 9 SKILL DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMS 10 WORK PROGRESSING IN DEVELOPMENT FOCUS 11 FIGHT AGAINST HIV-AIDS 12 SARVA SIKHYA ABHIYAN Therefore we have wide network and experiential man power with pragmatic, dynamic and goal oriented field workers working above mention field.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: BSM has been working in the Bastar division(Chhattisgarh)since last four decades.In this tenure,we implemented programme related health,Education,Awareness programme etc.We raised the education standard of the children

sourceOfFunds.purpose: The project works in five Gram Panchayats of Bakawand Block.The Project covers 2000 farmers and200 landless household.The main activities include promotion of system of rice intensification ,convergence with Govt.schemes,formation and strengthening of producer groups and promotion of co-operatives.Key Outputs of the project -Enhancing household income Rs.25000-30000,1000 mahila kisans will promote vegetable cultivation using sustainable agriculture practices,1300 farmers trained on millet culti.

The project improved life quality of women farmers and their households in Bastar. The major activities:-Profiling baseline Survey and end line survey of Mahila Kisans,promotion of Seed Bank and Energy Cool Chamber for preservation of vegetables.Creation of a cadre of a local community Resource persons .Achievement:- 2000 Mahila Kisan on Soil testing,Crop planning,Soil Health etc.921 Mahila Kisans promoted Rice in 540 acres of land and the production increase up to 5 quintals average per acre.

sourceOfFunds.departmentName: National Bank of Agriculture and Rural Development
sourceOfFunds.purpose: The project objective is establishing of vegetable Mart with Leverage of Govt.Schemes.Activities:-Mobilizing the farmers of target area,Training &Exposure visits for farmers.Improve irrigation facilities ,Promotion of livelihood ,Soil & Water conservation.Achieve:- Continuous wage employment during the project implementation.Conservation and rise in ground water level leading to increased in agriculture production etc,increased in fodder availability increased milk production.

sourceOfFunds.departmentName: National Agriculture bank for Rural Development
sourceOfFunds.purpose: The project objective is to improve food security and the social economics status of marginalized farming communities. Appropriate land treatment measures,Information and guidance about improved agriculture practices. Achievements:The cooperative member started organic vegetable selling through Harihar Bastar Bazar inaugurated by the honourable Chief Minister of CG Dr. Raman Singh.

sourceOfFunds.departmentName: National Agriculture bank for Rural Development
sourceOfFunds.purpose: The project objectives is to improve life quality of women farmers and conservation of soil and ground water level.Activities:- Promotion of seed bank and "O" energy cool chamber for preservation of vegetables.Improvement in agriculture productivity.Achievement:-Farmers are earning 10000/-to 12000/-additional income from mix vegetables cultivation.Controlled common seasonable diseases,increased livestock and stopped deforestation,improved economic condition of marginal farmers.
Purpose = Bringing sustainability in farming and Natural Resources of the area through soil and water conservation and sustainable farming practices
